post.description: Get employee pay statement based on the passed employee identifier.
Get employee last pay statement based on the passed employee identifier.

parameters.name: employeeID
parameters.description: Employee identification number

parameters.name: primaryJobCode
parameters.description: Code representing the employee's primary job

parameters.description: Title of the employee's job

parameters.description: Code indicating if the employee is full-time or part-time

parameters.description: Code representing the employee's primary work location

parameters.name: primaryProjectCode
parameters.description: Code representing the employee's primary project group

parameters.description: Code representing the earning group for the employee

parameters.description: Code representing the type of employee

parameters.name: employeeStatusCode
parameters.description: Code representing the status of the employee

parameters.name: employeeNumber
parameters.description: Number assigned to the employee

parameters.name: supervisorId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the employee's supervisor

parameters.description: Date when the employee was originally hired

parameters.name: lastHireDate
parameters.description: Date of the employee's last hire

parameters.name: dateLastPayDatePaid
parameters.description: Date of the employee's last pay date

parameters.name: payGroup
parameters.description: Group associated with the employee's pay.

parameters.name: isHomeCompany
parameters.description: Indicator if the company is the employee's home company

parameters.description: Pagination, which page you want to see

parameters.name: per_Page
parameters.description: Pagination, how many records per page you want to see

addressIsOnTaxBoundary.description: Indicates if the address is on a tax boundary

cobraIsActive.description: Indicates if COBRA is active for the employee

consentElectronicW2.description: Indicates consent for electronic W2 forms

consentElectronicw2pr.description: Indicates consent for electronic W2 forms (PR specific)

datetimeChanged.description: Timestamp indicating when the data was last updated

datetimeCreated.description: Timestamp indicating when the data was created

i9Verified.description: Indicates if I-9 form is verified

isDisabled.description: Indicates if the person is disabled

isMultiPayGroup.description: Indicates if the person is part of multiple pay groups

isSmoker.description: Indicates if the person is a smoker

militaryIsDisabledVet.description: Indicates if the person is a disabled veteran

militaryIsOthEligVet.description: Indicates if the person is other eligible veteran

militaryIsOthEligVetBasis.description: Basis for other eligible veteran status

militaryIsActiveWartimeVet.description: Indicates if the person is an active wartime veteran

w2IsDeceased.description: Indicates if the person is deceased for W2 forms

homePhoneIsPrivate.description: Indicates if home phone number is private

smsApprovals.description: Indicates if SMS approvals are enabled

smsPayNotification.description: Indicates if SMS notifications for pay are enabled

militaryIsMedalVet.description: Indicates if the person is a medal veteran

lastNameNotSameAsSSCard.description: Indicates if last name is different from Social Security Card

homePhoneCountry.description: Country code for home phone number

ssnIsSuppressed.description: Indicates if Social Security Number is suppressed

companyaddresspostalcode.description: Postal code of the company address

companyaddressstateorprovince.description: State or province of the company address

companyphone.description: Main phone number of the company

employeeamountytd.description: Deduction amount from the employee for the year

employeramount.description: Deduction amount contributed by the employer

employeramountytd.description: Employer deduction amount for the year

pretax.description: Indicates if the deduction is pre-tax

periodend.description: End date of the pay period

periodstart.description: Start date of the pay period

federaltaxablewagesytd.description: Federal taxable wages for the year

paydate.description: Date on which pay was issued

periodenddate.description: End date of the pay period

periodstartdate.description: Start date of the pay period

postalcode.description: Postal code for the employee's address

residentstateallowancesclaimed.description: State tax allowances claimed by the resident

residentstatefilingstatus.description: State filing status for the resident

stateorprovince.description: State or province of the employee

workstateallowancesclaimed.description: State tax allowances claimed by the employee

workstatefilingstatus.description: State tax filing status of the employee

fullTimeOrPartTimeCode.description: Code indicating if the job is full-time or part-time

primaryWorkLocationCode.description: Code for the primary work location

primaryProjectCode.description: Code for the primary project associated with the employee

employeeTypeCode.description: Code defining the type of employment

employeeStatusCode.description: Code representing the employee's current status

employeeNumber.description: Unique number assigned to the employee

originalHireDate.description: Date the employee was originally hired

lastHireDate.description: Date the employee was most recently hired

dateTimeCreated.description: Timestamp when the employee record was created

dateTimeChanged.description: Timestamp when the employee record was last modified

dateLastPayDatePaid.description: Date when the last payment was made to the employee

isHomeCompany.description: Indicates if the company is the employee's home company

page.description: Page number in a paginated response

per_Page.description: Number of items per page in a paginated response

lastNameNotSameAsSSCard.description: Last name differs from SS card

isSmoker.description: Indicates if the person is a smoker

payPeriodEndDate.description: End date of the pay period

periodEndDate.description: End date of the accounting period

periodStartDate.description: Start date of the accounting period

glRunDateTime.description: Date and time of GL run

totalNrOfBlocks.description: Total number of blocks in the run

userWhoRanThisGl.description: User who executed the GL run

glJson.description: JSON data of the general ledger run

dateTimeCreated.description: Timestamp when the record was created

title.description: Title summarizing the error or status

detail.description: Detailed description of the error or status

sequenceId.description: Identifier for the sequence in multistatus

status.description: Status of the operation in multistatus

modelstate.description: Contains validation errors (only if status is "error")

property-name.description: List of error messages keyed by property name

message.description: Error message for the specific property

type.description: Type of error for the specific property

body.description: Contains successful operation data (only if status is "success")

coid.description: List of company identifiers; home company is first

companyId.description: Identifier for the company associated with the employee

ptoPlan.description: Identifier for the PTO plan applicable to the employee

earned.description: Total PTO hours earned by the employee

taken.description: Total PTO hours taken by the employee

pendingBalance.description: Current balance of pending PTO hours

earnedThroughDate.description: Last date through which PTO has been accrued

reset.description: Date when the PTO balance resets

pendingMoveDate.description: Date relevant for pending PTO rules

companyID.description: Identifier for the company of the employee

employeeNumber.description: Unique number assigned to the employee

supervisorCompanyCode.description: Company code associated with the supervisor

supervisorStatusCode.description: Status code representing supervisor's employment status

supervisorJobCode.description: Job code assigned to the supervisor

supervisorPositionCode.description: Position code assigned to the supervisor

supervisorWorkPhone.description: Work phone number of the supervisor

supervisorPersonId.description: Unique identifier for the supervisor as a person

addressIsDifferentFromEmployee.description: Indicates if address differs from employee's address

cobraExport.description: Indicates if COBRA data is exported

cobraStatusDate.description: Date of the current COBRA status

dateOfCOBRALetter.description: Date when the COBRA letter was issued

isBeneficiary.description: Indicates if the individual is a beneficiary

isDependent.description: Indicates if the individual is a dependent

isDisabled.description: Indicates if the individual is disabled

isEmergencyContact.description: Indicates if the individual is an emergency contact

isSmoker.description: Indicates if the individual is a smoker

isStudent.description: Indicates if the individual is a student

workPhoneExtension.description: Extension for the work phone number

isActive.description: Indicates if the record is active
